data.text: À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ!
wɔi wo losu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi wu,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yiimazeɠeni ga Zakɔɓe,
Ungo, gè kwɛɛ gè ɠɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wɔɔlɔʋɛ,
Nii nɔpɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI pɔ, naa ɠa a ɗa kɛ,
Toɠa ɗa tonaɓiingi wuzeɠe zou ɓela ga ná pɛ,
Toɠa ɓalaa é doun zunu mɔungiti pɛ paani Ezipete yooi zu,
É poogiti dɛɛni, ta maaɓɛlɛ vaiti Ezipete yooi zu,
É zii ɠiligiti ma mɔinmɔin koloɠoloni,
naa ɠɛni ga Siɠon, Amool nuiti ta-masagi,
É ta-yooi ɠɛɛni ga tɔnɔ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è-lɔɠɔi ɠa ná eyɛsu ɠɔ.
Ungo, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa sɔle fai ɠɛ ná-nuɓusɛiti bɛ,
Zii ɠiligiti ta-ɠɔɔɠɔ ganigiti ta ga walii ta zanugi,
Daaʋɛ ɠa ti ʋa, kɛlɛ ti la ɓɔɛzu la,
goiyeɠei ɠa ti ʋa, kɛlɛ ti la faa mɛnisu da,
Ti ɓɛtɛ nuiti kulaʋɛ ga tiye,
Izilayɛle mavofodaiti, à Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mama.
Levi mavofodaiti, à Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mama.
Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, é tɔɔzei Siyɔn gizei ma,
